translation.landing-advanced-filtering-desc: Real-time search and filter functionality across tasks
translation.landing-calendar-integration-description: OAuth 2.0 integration with Google Calendar API enables seamless calendar synchronization. The implementation supports multiple Google calendars, event creation/editing, and conflict detection. Calendar data is cached locally with background sync for optimal performance.
translation.landing-chakra-ui-desc: Component library with custom theme system
translation.landing-conflict-detection-desc: Automatic detection and handling of scheduling conflicts
translation.landing-core-functionality: Core functionality implemented in this application experience design.
translation.landing-cta-description: Experience the full application with interactive demos, or review the complete source code to explore the implementation details and architecture decisions.
translation.landing-cta-features: â€¢ Interactive application demo â€¢ Complete source code available â€¢ Documentation included
translation.landing-customizable-layouts-desc: Dynamic column and group creation with color customization
translation.landing-drag-drop-interface-desc: Smooth drag interactions with visual feedback and accessibility support
translation.landing-event-management-desc: Create, edit, and delete Google Calendar events directly
translation.landing-form-validation-desc: Real-time validation with React Hook Form and Yup schemas
translation.landing-google-apis-desc: Google Calendar, Meet and Map API integration
translation.landing-google-calendar-sync-desc: Bidirectional calendar integration with OAuth 2.0 authentication. View, create, and edit Google Calendar events within the application.
translation.landing-hero-description: A full-stack task management application featuring Kanban boards with drag-and-drop functionality, Google Calendar integration, and comprehensive internationalization. Built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB.
translation.landing-interactive-demo-available: Interactive demo available â€¢ Full source code on GitHub
translation.landing-interactive-kanban-desc: Drag-and-drop task management with real-time state synchronization. Features custom drag previews, drop zones, and smooth animations.
translation.landing-internationalization-desc: Full i18n support with English and Japanese locales. Theme switching with persistent user preferences.
translation.landing-internationalization-feature-des: React i18next implementation with English and Japanese support
translation.landing-jwt-authentication-desc: Token-based auth with refresh token rotation
translation.landing-kanban-description: Tasks can be moved between columns and groups with real-time Redux state updates and MongoDB persistence. The implementation includes custom drag previews, drop animations, and optimistic UI updates.
translation.landing-modern-libraries-desc: Utilizing the power of hello-pangea/dnd and react-big-calendar
translation.landing-multiple-view-modes-desc: Month, week, and day views with responsive design
translation.landing-oauth-authentication-desc: Secure Google OAuth 2.0 implementation with token management
translation.landing-optimistic-updates-desc: Immediate UI feedback with graceful error handling and rollback
translation.landing-react-hooks-desc: Functional components with custom hooks architecture
translation.landing-redux-desc: Centralized state management with optimistic updates
translation.landing-task-management-system-desc: Comprehensive task organization with groups, scheduling, and progress tracking. Includes search and filtering capabilities.
translation.landing-task-scheduling-desc: Multiple schedules per task are supported for flexible timeboxing
translation.landing-tech-stack-description: Modern web development stack with focus on performance, scalability, and maintainable code architecture.
translation.landing-theme-system-desc: Dynamic theme switching with Chakra UI integration and persistence
translation.landing-ux-design-description: The application implements comprehensive UX patterns including theme switching, internationalization, error handling, and responsive design. All interactions include proper loading states, error boundaries, and accessibility features for screen readers.
translation.tooltip-time_slot-sync: Click to sync with Google Calendar
translation.yup-date-max: Date must be on or before ${max}
translation.yup-date-min: Date must be on or after ${min}
translation.yup-string-email: Please enter a valid email address
translation.yup-string-trim: There should be no spaces at the beginning or end
